level.heading: Information reporting.
level.text: Within 3 days after the Mayor's receipt of the transcript of proceedings relating to the issuance of any series of bonds, the Mayor shall transmit a copy of this transcript to the Secretary to the Council.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-340.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-46, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-340.01.
